source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_000<tab>Happy Starlight, adventurer. If you have any questions regarding the celebrations this year, you need but ask.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_000<tab>私は、星芒祭実行委員の広報係です。
「星芒祭」に関することなら、何でも聞いてくださいね！
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_A1_000_002<tab>あなたたちは、ここで何をしている？

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_010<tab>The Starlight Celebration can be traced back to ancient Ishgard. Long ago, a terrible battle claimed countless lives, leaving thousands of children orphaned in the harsh cold weather of Coerthas.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_010<tab>かつて、エオルゼア各都市が争っていたころ……。
北方の都市「イシュガルド」の街路では、
戦災孤児たちが星を数え、寒さを紛らわせていました。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_011<tab>Unable to bear their suffering, Ishgardian knights would offer these children board and lodging within their barracks. Of course, this was expressly forbidden, but the knights devised a plan to sneak them in, disguising the children in jackets of their scarlet uniforms.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_011<tab>それを見かねたイシュガルドの衛兵が軍規を破り、
孤児に自分たちの緋色の外套を着せ、兵舎へと招き入れた……。
この美談が形を変え、今日の「星芒祭」となりました。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_012<tab>Owing to their generosity, the children survived the winter and lived to pay forward the kindness they had received. The former orphans would adorn themselves in scarlet uniforms, delivering gifts to children on the coldest week of the year. Thus, the Starlight Celebration was born.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_012<tab>寒さの厳しくなる季節、子どもは星神へ祈りを捧げ、
大人が星神からの贈り物を、子どもに配るという祝祭ですね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_013<tab>Over the years, the celebration has undergone gradual changes. The snowy-bearded captain of the kind-hearted knights has become known as the “Saint of Nymeia,” and children believe that he delivers their hopes and prayers directly to the goddess Herself.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_013<tab>「星芒祭」には、イシュガルドの衛兵も形を変えて現れます。
白い髭を蓄えた衛兵隊長は「星神の聖人」となり、
子どもの祈りを星神に届ける存在として登場するのです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_014<tab>Similarly, his red-jacketed knights have become the “saint's little helpers.” They are particularly beloved by the younglings, for it is their role to bring gifts to every child who sends a prayer to the Spinner.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_014<tab>そして、部下の衛兵は、緋色の衣装を着た「聖人の従者」となり、
祈りの礼として渡される星神からの贈り物を、
子どもたちに配る者として親しまれているのですよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_020<tab>My scarlet-clad colleagues and I have been charged by the Adventurers' Guild with running the Starlight Celebration. The festival spans the entire realm of Eorzea, and we have little helpers stationed in the cities of Gridania, Limsa Lominsa, and Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_020<tab>私たちは、冒険者ギルドの「星芒祭」の実行委員会です。
グリダニア、リムサ・ロミンサ、ウルダハの三都市にまたがり、
「星芒祭」を開催しています。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_021<tab>We even have participants from Sharlayan this year─an associate professor and his talented reindeer, who is said to possess the power to create miraculous glamours in the presence of children.
target: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_021<tab>Cette année, nous avons décidé d'aider un chercheur venu de Sharlayan et son renne aux aptitudes pour le moins étranges<var 1D /var>: il serait capable d'invoquer des spectres pour amuser les enfants<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_022<tab>Alas, it seems as though they have run into some unforeseen complications and have yet to share these wonders with the younglings of Gridania. I do hope they manage to resolve the situation soon...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_022<tab>ただ、催しを始める前段階で、
なにやら問題が起きているらしくて……。
子どもたちのためにも、解決するといいのですが。

source: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_023<tab>In fact, I believe they were just recently seeking a certain adventurer's assistance to help spread cheer throughout Gridania... If you have any inkling as to who that is, be so good as to speak with Laurenssen.
target: TEXT_FESXMS2022GUIDE_00799_GUIDEXMS2022_000_023<tab>D'ailleurs, ce monsieur Laurenssen requérait l'aide d'une certaine personne pour réussir à amuser les enfants de la cité... Si vous voyez de qui il s'agit, allez donc lui en parler, il sera ravi<var 1D /var>!
